name: stackexchange-badge
description: `<se-badge>` is a [Custom Element](https://github.com/polymer/CustomElements) with [StackExchange](http://api.stackexchange.com/) ([StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/), [ServerFault](http://serverfault.com/), ...) user badge, that provides basic profile summary (gravatar, username, reputation, badge count).
